data.title: Skin so soft
data.body:
I recently had the opportunity to try out the Dove Body Wash with Pump Deep Moisture for Dry Skin, and I have to say, I am extremely impressed with this product.

First and foremost, the packaging is very convenient and practical. The pump makes it easy to dispense just the right amount of product, without any mess or wastage. The 30.6 oz size is also a great value for the price, and ensures that I won't be running out of this body wash anytime soon.

As someone with dry skin, I am always on the lookout for products that will help nourish and moisturize my skin. This body wash definitely does the job! The 24hr Renewing MicroMoisture formula leaves my skin feeling incredibly soft and hydrated, even hours after showering. I have even noticed a significant improvement in the dry patches on my elbows and knees since using this body wash.

The scent of this body wash is also a major selling point for me. It has a light and refreshing fragrance that is not overpowering, yet still leaves a pleasant scent on my skin. It's perfect for someone who prefers a more subtle scent in their skincare products.

Another great thing about this body wash is that it is suitable for all skin types. I have sensitive skin and have had no issues with irritation or harsh reactions. It is also gentle enough for daily use and does not strip the skin of its natural oils.

Overall, I would highly recommend the Dove Body Wash with Pump Deep Moisture for Dry Skin to anyone looking for a moisturizing body wash that delivers on its promises. It has quickly become a staple in my skincare routine and I can't imagine going back to any other body wash. Thank you Dove for creating such a fantastic product!

data.title: A miracle for dry skin
data.body: I've struggled with dry skin my entire life, and I've tried countless body washes that promise to moisturize and hydrate, but fall short. That is, until I discovered Dove Body Wash with Pump Deep Moisture! This amazing cleanser has been a game-changer for my skin. The rich, creamy formula leaves my skin feeling soft, supple, and most importantly, hydrated! The pump dispenser makes it easy to use and the scent is light and pleasant. I've noticed a significant improvement in the overall health and appearance of my skin since switching to this body wash. It's truly a miracle worker for dry skin! 5 stars and highly recommended!

data.title: Very moisturizing product
data.body: I love this product. Will definitely buy again. My skin feels so wonderful. I love the smell. Great value and just a quality product.

data.title: Smells good and moisturizes
data.body: Great price for 30.6oz bottle, pump works great. Smell amazing and lasts and it's moisturizing. A little goes along way on a loofa.

data.title: Good
data.body: Good, i love the scent and keeps my skin moisturize

data.title: Leaves my skin soft!
data.body: Dove Deep Moisture Body Wash, in its 30.6 oz bottle, is a standout product that goes beyond the ordinary in skincare. Specifically crafted to nourish dry skin, this body wash not only effectively cleanses but also provides a deep and lasting moisturizing experience. Boasting a plant-based and sulfate-free formula, it aligns with the growing demand for environmentally conscious and skin-friendly products. The vegan certification and PETA approval further underscore Dove's commitment to ethical practices. The result is a luxurious, guilt-free bathing experience that leaves the skin feeling soft, supple, and thoroughly cared for. Dove Deep Moisture Body Wash is a reliable choice for those seeking a high-quality, cruelty-free option to elevate their daily skincare routine.

data.title: Arrive in box within 24hrs from Cali. to Hon,Hi. Perfect & So fast‚ù£Ô∏èüöêüì¶‚ö†Ô∏è‚úÖ
data.body:
TRUST & BELIEVE FROM EXPERIENCE‚ù£Ô∏è
Moisturizer & SPF are your best friends when it comes to aging‚ÄºÔ∏è ü´ßüõÅüßºü´ß
DOVE BODY WASH IS #1‚ù£Ô∏èüèÜü•á‚úÖüíØ‚ùå‚≠ïÔ∏è‚ô•Ô∏èüíã

I have 3 older sister‚Äôs we all have tried many brands over the years. As you age your skin looses its oil‚Äôs, and make your skin dryer than in your youth! Using a ph balanced soaps, makes all the difference in having youthful looking skin!

By using moisturizer you slowdown aging & help your skin from loosing it‚Äôs elasticity! Plus it helps aid you, from getting fine line wrinkles! We‚Äôre all die hard fans of Olay products, but just not in the shower anymore! Our grandmother fell in the bathtub and broke her hip at 68, she was never the same! She lived to be 94, but had to be monitored by health nurse. She walked with a limp, and ended up in a wheelchair for life!
üö´ü´ßüõÄüèªüßºüõÅü´ßüöøüö´

At the age of 40 I switched out all of my hand soap pumps, to Oil of Olay body wash! I used it in every bathroom & even in the laundry room & my kitchen! Because using regular hand soaps, started to dry out the skin on my hands! I seen the noticeable differences, on my skin right away! I still use a moisturizing bath soaps, as my hand soap!

My grandmother had used Ivory, for generations!
She educated us on the importance of only using PH balanced soap‚Äôs on our skin for both bodies & hair! You can purchase PH test strips at most drug store! Including Amazon!

So Ivory was what my mom & the family used!
My grandmother told me that all Ivory dish soaps & bar soaps are PH balanced! That Ivory soap is gentle enough to use on a baby, and even on your hair! So If you should run out of shampoo! Worst case scenario, she said Johnson‚Äôs Baby Shampoo is another PH balanced soap! She advised us to keep some on hand, at all times as a backup plan for your householdl!

My sister Vicki lives in Las Vegas, she has a swimming pool in back of her house. She used Olay body wash, and had some by her outside shower. The whole pool area was cement, except the shower area it was done in a beautiful ceramic tile.

She was having a pool party, with some work friends over. She decided to buy some Olay body wash in a large pump for her outside shower! Along with some Shampoo & Conditioner. So her guest would feel comfortable, as the evening progresses!

She said three people slipped, and almost fell! So I said well, that was a law suit waiting to happen! So she changed to her Dove body wash, she had been using dove for years! As her personal facial soap, and bath soap. Vicki said she loved how creamy it was on her skin! That it‚Äôs the best soap in the market place! No offense to grandma of course‚ù£Ô∏è

We all collectively switched to Dove! DOVE DEEP MOISTURE, NOURISHING BODY WASH.

Just a heads up!
Hi I‚Äôm Kathi I live in Hawaii, my sister Vicki lives in Las Vegas, Patti lives in Iowa and Penni lives in Texas!

I use to use Olay body wash, until I almost fell in my shower! It is literally a health hazard! It has way too much oil in it, do your heavy moisturizing after you get out of the shower! It coated my whole bathtub, knobs, and the wall tiles with oil! It caused an oily build up over everything!

Using the spray on scrubbing bubbles, wasn‚Äôt cutting it anymore! I had to take Ajax & a scouring pad to remove it! Way too much back breaking work, at age 70 I only want convenience in my daily life! Olay bath wash just wasn‚Äôt cutting it for me!

Like I said I had a very hard time scrubbing it off! It just became to much, to deal with loved the Olay moisturizing bath wash. But hated the mess it made & how slippery it made my bathtub!

I put one foot down & slid completely to the opposite side of the tub! I grabbed the wall to steady myself, and it was just as greasy! I thought for sure I was going down! My worst fears of ending up like my grandma! But thanks to a handicapped shower seat I have. I landed on it, but it scared the Bah-Jesus out of me!

Don‚Äôt get me wrong, I switched to Dove for it‚Äôs moisturizing soap & safety reasons, I‚Äôm sharing my experience with moisturizing bath & shower!

We love Olay products and use them all the time, but their bath wash has so much oil in it. We each had problems with slipping in the shower, it builds up in the bath tub! It scared us to the point of changing our brands, to using only Dove Body Wash! We were all pleasantly surprised, it moisturized our skin just as good as Olay bath wash! But even better, none of us has slipped do to oily build up DOVE WE LOVE YOU!
It‚Äôs our families #1 choice of bath & shower soaps! We even use it for our hand soaps too‚ù£Ô∏è
Couldn‚Äôt be happier with Doves products, so it will be passed down to our families future generations‚ù£Ô∏èü´ßüõÅü´ßüõÄüèªüßºüöøü´ß

Fond memories, grandma would put all four of us little sisters. Into the bathtub together when we were young, she‚Äôd squirt Ivory dish soap in the tub & swish the soap around! Because we wanted a bubble bath, and bubble bath is what we got!
She was right about the PH balanced soaps‚Äô ahead of her time she was! Because we grew up in the 1950‚Äôs‚ù£Ô∏è

True test of a good soap is a ph balance strip! Find out what‚Äôs in your soaps & hair products!
95% of the Shampoos & Conditioners sold in American stores, isn‚Äôt PH Balanced‚ÄºÔ∏èüö´üßºü´ß

Mahalo for your time!
We all feel safe using dove in the bathtubü´ß üõÄüèªüßº& üõÄüèªüöøü´ßand the shower‚ù£Ô∏è‚úÖüëåüèªüëçüèªü§ôüèªü´∂üèªü§óüíû

data.title: Fresh, clean and gentle Dove Bodywash
data.body: I particularly like the clean scent and gentle softness this bodywash gives my skin. My body feels soft and totally fresh after my shower with Dove deep moisture.

data.title: Love the feeling of my skin after using this during my showers
data.body: I'll admit, I was a bar of soap kind of person until switching to this. I had stayed at a hotel while on a business trip and the room provided this in a dispenser. Rather than opening the bars of soap I had brought and having to deal with the mess afterwards, I decided to use the provided body wash instead. I was blown away by the feeling after my shower. I immediately purchased some of this for at home. I can't believe it's taken me my whole life to discover the wonders of a good body soap. It doesn't strip the oil on my skin and leaves it feeling nice and smooth. At first, I thought I wasn't doing a good enough job washing it off, but that wasn't the case. I was just use to soap stripping my skin of oils and leaving it kind of squeaky when running my hand over it. Now I need to figure out what I'm going to do with all the bars of soap remaining from the subscription I had :)

data.title: Full
data.body: Fast deliver service as usual. Full to the top, this is much cheaper than going to the store to buy it. I‚Äôve been using this for years and I have sensitive skin, and it doesn‚Äôt make me break out at all! Smells nice and clean, I always get compliments on how good I smell. I love this soap. I get the bar when I‚Äôm traveling and it lasts forever!

data.title: Luxurious Moisture for Thirsty Skin
data.body: Dove's Deep Moisture Body Wash has been a revelation for my dry skin, especially in the harsh winter months. Its creamy texture and nourishing formula leave my skin feeling soft, hydrated, and rejuvenated after every shower. The pump bottle is incredibly convenient, ensuring no product is wasted. A staple in my daily skincare routine!

data.title: Could Not Get the Pump to WOrk
data.body: I ordered a 3-pack and it is a good thing that I did! The first bottle that I opened had a defective pump.....could not get it to work. However, the pump on the second bottle did work. If the first bottle that I tried to used was ordered as a single pack, I would have returned it because its pump is defective. Otherwise, I like the ease of using a pump to dispense and the scent is great!

data.title: Love it! Great smell. Moisturizing & foamy!
data.body: I used the soap while visiting my daughter, and had to immediately buy some when I got home. It is very moisturizing and foams. Very very nice and does not have an obnoxious smell. The smell is good for both men and women. I love this stuff and wish I had found it sooner.

data.body: Feels like lathering a luxurious lotion on your skin, so nice!!! I feel moisturized and smooth after my shower! Will never buy a different body wash.

data.body:
I was looking for a good quality soap that doesn't bother the skin, and I found this dove soap!
It is luxurious, smooth, and gets rid of all the oils really nicely, it also doesn't bother your skin if it's sensitive.
This also came with a few in one pack, and for a great price, I would definitely recommend it.

data.title: Unbelievable moisturizing body wash
data.body: I am delightfully amazed at this Doves moisturizing body wash. I had horribly dry legs and arms this winter. Started using this body wash and within 2 days, my skin was soft and supple again. I didn't even need lotion anymore. Simply amazing product!

data.title: Satisfied customer
data.body: I purchased this item for my daughter. Because of her sensitive skin, this seems to be the product that really works for her

data.title: Long lasting
data.body: I love that this body wash lasts very long in my household, however, I do not like that it leaves my skin (just as with most body washes) feeling as if there is still another layer of soap on my body. To combat this feel, I have to either 1.) Put my shower head on blast, or 2.) Use my washcloth (soap rinsed off) to wipe the extra soap off my body as I rinse off. I always end up in changing the wayer pressure to remove the extra soap layer. On the plus side, you don't have to use much soap for it to lather up and spread.

I'm sure it would work fine as a body wash - it takes just a tiny dab for my hands to have a good lather and it is obviously moisturizing.
